section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on April 4, 2021.*
section.heading: Definitions.

para.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
"Marijuana" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 48-901.02.
"Qualifying patient" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 7-1671.01(19).

"Safety sensitive position" means a position with duties that, if performed while under the influence of drugs or alcohol could lead to a lapse of attention that could cause actual, immediate, and permanent physical injury or loss of life to self or others.
